What is a Pod in Kubernetes?: How can you balance network traffic across Pods?

What is a Pod in Kubernetes?: What is the role of the Kubernetes Vertical Pod Autoscaler?
A Pod in Kubernetes includes one or more: The Kubernetes Vertical Pod Autoscaler scales Pods up or down vertically to meet demand.
